name: MIS Activity Attendances Not Recorded Report
description:
Provides a list of prisoners who were due to attend prison activities within a specified time period but have not had a record of attendance.
ACT0001 - v00.00.08 Last Modified: 02/08/10

dataset.name: Activity Attendances Not Recorded
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.END_TIME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK=AT_DOB.DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y' ) AND ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK =(SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code:','A','Activities\Activity Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Enter Begin Date (DD/MM/YYYY):','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:3) */ ) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME < to_date((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Enter End Date (DD/MM/YYYY):','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:4) */ )) + 1 ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION in (SELECT ACTIVITY_NAME FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Activity Name (All for all)','A','Activities\Activity Description',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:83) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ACTIVITY_NAME FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Activity Name (All for all)','A','Activities\Activity Description',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:83) */ ) ) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SUSPENDED_FLAG = 'N' AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS Is Null )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_CODE NOT(IN ('ATT','CANC')))
